entry.title: 100cts+ Mixed Gem Beginner Lot: Sapphire, Emerald, Opal, Amethyst, Citrine, Moonstone AND MORE!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skyjems
Type: Mixed Gemstones
Price: 170.00

 

 

*****THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR WHOLESALE OTHER PROMOTIONAL DISCOUNTS*****
Thank you so much for taking the time to view this beautiful lot that is an AMAZING value!

All stones in the lot are natural, earth mined gemstones, no synthetics/imitations etc. 

This is a perfect lot for people who are new to gems and jewelry and want to make jewelry, study gems or resell loose gemstones. 

There is a lot of money left on the table with this lot and I am sure that just about anyone should do well reselling these gems, whether they are set up in jewelry or being sold loose.

All stones are shipped in marked bags with the gem type, origin, treatment, measurements and weights. 

Please note, all weights and measurements are approximate. All lots are guaranteed to have AT LEAST 100cts total weight, if you add up the weights below you will see that the total comes out to approximately 116cts.


Bag 1:
16x11mm Pear Lapis Lazuli
1 stone, ~ 7.76 cts 
Origin: Afghanistan
Treatment: None

Bag 2:
11x9mm Rectangle Lapis Lazuli
1 Stone, ~5.30cts
Origin: Afghanistan
Treatment: None

Bag 3: 
9x7mm Oval Rhodolite Garnet
1 stone, ~2.22cts
Origin: Kenya
Treatment: None

Bag 4:

1 stone, ~12.48cts
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 5:
20x15mm Rectangle Carnelian
1 stone, ~18cts,
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 6:
17x7.5mm Saddle Cut Onyx
5 stones, ~14cts
Origin: Unknown
Treatment: Dyed (Stable)

Bag 7:
7mm Round Citrine
3 stones, ~4cts
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 8:
3mm Round Pink Tourmaline
10 stones, ~1ct,
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 9:
3mm Rd Green Tourmaline
5 stones, ~0.58cts,
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 10:

Origin: Thailand
Treatment: Heat

2 stones, ~0.48cts,
Origin: Sri Lanka
Treatment: None

Bag 12:
Ametrine Leaf Carving
1 stone, ~5cts
Origin: Bolivia
Treatment: None

Bag 13:
14x10mm E/C Blue Topaz

Origin: Brazil
Treatment: Heat and/or Radiation

Bag 14: 
3mm Sq. Orange Sapphire
2 stones, ~0.46cts
Origin: Thailand
Treatment: Beryllium Diffusion

Bag 15:

1 stone, ~5.42cts
Origin: Brazil
Treatment: None

Bag 16: 
8x6mm Oval Rainbow Moonstone
5 stones, ~6.18cts
Origin: India
Treatment: None

Bag 17:

Origin: Ethiopia
Treatment: None

Bag 18:

Origin: Brazil

Treatment: None

Bag 22:
Emerald Beads (2-4mm)

Origin: Zambia
Treatment: Oil

Bag 23:
3mm Square Garnet
20 st, ~4cts 
Origin: Mozambique
Treatment: None


Please note: All items subject to availability, if items are unavailable at time of ordering, close substitutions may be made without informing you.


Internal SKU: 100ct Wholesale Lot
Please quote SKU if you have any questions about this gem.

entry.title: 10ct Mixed Multi Colour Natural Sapphire
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skyjems
Type: Wholesale Lot
Price: 110.00

Thanks so much for looking! 

This is a mixed bag of rainbows for you! 

The sizes range from about as small as 0.01cts-0.02cts to over 1cts each, the average is around 0.15cts - 0.20cts, but, your parcel may vary. 

As you can see from the pictures and video, it has all the colours!

All stones are heat treated, some are heat and diffusion treated. 100% no glass!
